resources.string: Lead iOS Engineer at Tidbt Technologies LLC
University of Illinois at Chicago • Glenview Illinois
Currently a senior at the University of Illinois at Chicago. One and a half years of Mobile Development experience with determination to attain additional knowledge in this line of work.

• Developed a Social Media Platform that promotes honesty and is built with the integration of the academic discipline of psychology.

 • Built front end in Swift with the ability to scale to all iPhone screen sizes.

 • Assisted in the design of NoSQL database (Firebase Firestore) to minimize reads and writes.

 • Developed back-end APIs using Firebase Cloud Functions in Node.JS.

 • Visit us at tidbt.com.
